mapper.select: SELECT d.anno_capacitacion, COUNT(d.rbd_colegio) AS cantidad_colegio, r.id AS id_region, r.nombre AS nombre_region, SUM( CASE WHEN d.rbd_colegio IN (SELECT col.rbd_colegio FROM pnld.colegio AS col JOiN pnld.docente AS doc ON col.rbd_colegio = doc.rbd_colegio GROUP BY col.rbd_colegio HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT doc.anno_capacitacion) = 1) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS primera_vez_porcentaje FROM pnld.docente AS d JOIN pnld.colegio AS c ON d.rbd_colegio = c.rbd_colegio JOIN pnld.region AS r ON c.id_region = r.id WHERE d.anno_capacitacion BETWEEN #{fromYear} and #{toYear} GROUP BY r.id, d.anno_capacitacion ORDER BY r.id
